data.deskripsi: My name is Yudha. I successfully graduated as Diploma of Informatic Management, State Polytechnic of Malang. A skilled Fullstack developer with 2+ years in website and android app development using PHP, Javascript and Kotlin. I am always willing to learn new technologies in full stack development, to provide innovative and efficient software development solutions. I am committed to continuously improving my skills and knowledge, to provide the best results in software development.
